subject: re: Re: Using a Regex object
body:
> Moritz Lenz  wrote:
> 
> Hi,
>> philcrow@sunflower.com wrote:
>> Can someone point me to the docs or code where I can find out how to use
>> that Regex object (or to the proper list or channel in which to ask)?
>> I'm hoping the regex is going to contained my named captures.
>
>It's in S05: http://perlcabal.org/syn/S05.html#Return_values_from_matches>
>
>HTH, Moritz  --  Moritz Lenz http://moritz.faui2k3.org/ -
>http://sudokugarden.de/ - http://perl-6.de/ 

Thanks for that pointer.  I looked in the pugs tests for these features, and saw a lot of them (or was it all of them) marked todo.  Does anyone know when we are likely to be able to use the grammars and get an AST from them?

I'm willing to pitch in, if my skills are up to it.  But, I would need some advice on where to start.

Phil
